title: Productivity Prediction system
description: Developed a productivity predicion web appplication as for the software development group project. It analyses the user's productivity through machine learning components and display the user's productivity summary and the prdiction

title: University grading system
description: Developed a program for university students and staff to input credits and receive output regarding whether a student can progress, is in a module trailer, or needs to repeat a module.

title: Coders Point Website
description: Developed an educational website that user can learn coding languages by purchasing courses and doing quizzes..

title: Foodies fave queue management system
description: Developed a queue management system for Foodies Fave food center. user can order the food. if the queue is full customer is added to the waiting list.

title: Guessing game
description: Developed a colour peg guessing game

title: Shopping Console Menu
description: Developed Console Menu  for system management, including adding/deleting products, listing products, and saving/loading data from a file.Designed Graphical User Interface (GUI)   allowing users to visualize and interact with product lists, add items to a shopping cart with discounts, and manage purchases effectively.
